Comment: 오늘은 영국의 Brexit와 영국 총리의 고뇌에 대한 이야기를 다룹니다. 왜 영국 총리는 지금 고뇌하고 있는지 확인해보세요.
EnglishComment: Today we're talking about Brexit in England and the agony of the British Prime Minister. Check out why the British prime minister is in trouble.

Themes.Theme: Michael Cohen, a former lawyer for the U.S. president, is sentenced to three years in federal prison.
A confidence vote concerning Britain's prime minister.
What drug is now considered to be the most deadly in America.
